meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I'm on track in my environmental studies major
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Michelle and I'm a first-year student majoring in Environmental Studies. This is my first semester in college, and I’ve already taken a few major-specific courses and some general environmental studies classes. However, I’m feeling a lot more stressed than I thought I would be, and I’m questioning if I even belong in this major or if I should be switching to something else. I also feel really burned out from school and feeling like I’m doing something important, but I don’t know if that's what I’m doing. I'm worried I'm not doing well enough to be in this major, and I'm not sure how to get help.
